name: Longsword
description: A longsword is a versatile weapon with a double-edged blade and a hilt long enough to be wielded with two hands. It is commonly used by knights and warriors.

name: Shortsword
description: A shortsword is a small, lightweight sword with a sharp, double-edged blade. It is designed for quick and agile strikes in close combat.

name: Greatsword
description: A greatsword is a large two-handed sword with a long, straight blade. It is designed for powerful and sweeping strikes, capable of inflicting devastating damage.

name: Battleaxe
description: A battleaxe is a large, heavy weapon with a sharp, double-edged blade mounted on a long wooden or metal shaft. It is designed for both slashing and chopping attacks in close combat.

name: Greataxe
description: A greataxe is a massive two-handed axe with a long handle and a large, heavy blade. It is designed for delivering devastating slashing attacks in close combat.

name: Mace
description: A mace is a blunt weapon with a heavy, metal head mounted on a sturdy wooden or metal shaft, designed for delivering powerful and crushing blows in close combat.

name: Spear
description: A spear is a long, pointed weapon consisting of a wooden shaft with a sharp metal head at one end. It is designed for thrusting and throwing.

name: Dagger
description: A dagger is a short, double-edged blade used for stabbing or thrusting. It is lightweight and easy to conceal.

name: Rapier
description: A rapier is a slender, sharply pointed sword designed for thrusting attacks. It is known for its agility and precision in combat.

name: Scimitar
description: A scimitar is a curved, single-edged sword with a sharp point. It is commonly used in the Middle East and North Africa.

name: Flail
description: A flail is a weapon consisting of a striking head attached to a handle by a flexible rope, chain, or other similar material. It is designed to deliver powerful and unpredictable strikes in close combat.

name: Morningstar
description: A morningstar is a spiked weapon consisting of a metal ball mounted on a shaft, with a handle. The spikes on the ball can cause piercing and bludgeoning damage.

name: Halberd
description: A halberd is a two-handed pole weapon that consists of an axe blade topped with a spike mounted on a long shaft. It is a versatile weapon that can be used for both slashing and thrusting attacks.

name: Club
description: A club is a simple weapon that consists of a short staff or stick made of wood or metal, often with a weighted end. It is commonly used for striking or bludgeoning opponents.

name: Quarterstaff
description: A quarterstaff is a long wooden pole, typically made of oak or ash, that is used as a versatile melee weapon. It can be wielded with one or two hands and is known for its simplicity and effectiveness.
